sent.orig: Speak little of your ill luck and boast not of your good luck.
sent.trans: 少说失意事，莫夸好运道。

sent.orig: Nedved, a tough and nice man, luck! It's ur last opportunity. Ditto the old coach. luck.
sent.trans: 内德维德好运，这是你最后的机会了。坚强纯良。还有儒雅的白发老教练布吕克纳。好运。

sent.orig: All of us have bad luck and good luck.
sent.trans: 所有人都有好运气和坏运气。

sent.orig: If I didn't have bad luck I wouldn't have any luck at all.
Your, your good luck charm? -- MYRA: Perhaps it'll bring you luck, I hope it does.
sent.trans: 罗伊：你的幸运符？--玛拉：也许它会给你带来好运，我希望它能。
